item.title: 5 Ways Travis And Taylor Can Make Peace With All The Football Fans They’ve Been Irking
item.description: Travis and Taylor moving the ball down the field in all five categories might help football fans endure one more NFL season of Tayvis.

item.title: John Roberts Invites Leftist Bullying Campaigns Against SCOTUS By Playing Politics On The Bench
item.description: The left's perpetual belief that bullying campaigns against SCOTUS work can be attributed to Chief Justice John Roberts.

item.title: DOJ’s Rumored Trans Gun Ban Does Nothing But Play Right Into Democrats’ Hands
item.description: Taking away firearms never has and never will remedy evil or keep institutions from routinely feeding people’s gender delusions.

item.title: Crime-Loving Democrats Refuse To Confirm 10 US Attorneys
item.description: Before Trump had a single nominee for U.S. attorney confirmed, Democrat Sen. Dick Durbin put a 'blanket hold' on all 93 U.S. attorney positions.

item.title: Tim Kaine Thinks You’re A Terrorist If You Believe Rights Come From God
item.description: The idea that rights come from God, rather than the state, is neither radical nor foreign. It is the foundational principle of the Republic.
